timeline.message:
Upgrade GCS SDK to 1.104.0

Upgrading the GCS SDK to the most recent version.
Adjusting (i.e. improving) the REST mock accordingly.
This should significantly boost performance by pulling in
https://github.com/googleapis/java-core/issues/86 in some cases.

timeline.bodyText: This got way increased in googleapis/java-core#86 :)
timeline.bodyHTML: This got way increased in googleapis/java-core#86 :)
timeline.author: original-brownbear

timeline.body: For some reason the `toBuilder` keeps track of all settings but these two in the latest version so we have to manually set these again.
timeline.bodyText: For some reason the toBuilder keeps track of all settings but these two in the latest version so we have to manually set these again.
timeline.bodyHTML: For some reason the toBuilder keeps track of all settings but these two in the latest version so we have to manually set these again.
timeline.author: original-brownbear

timeline.body: There seems to be a behavior change with retries here. The retries are now executed across multiple different TCP connections instead of reusing the same connection. This means we can't key them by the full address including the port any longer because that would allow for more retries than we assume.
timeline.bodyText: There seems to be a behavior change with retries here. The retries are now executed across multiple different TCP connections instead of reusing the same connection. This means we can't key them by the full address including the port any longer because that would allow for more retries than we assume.
timeline.bodyHTML: There seems to be a behavior change with retries here. The retries are now executed across multiple different TCP connections instead of reusing the same connection. This means we can't key them by the full address including the port any longer because that would allow for more retries than we assume.
timeline.author: original-brownbear

timeline.body:
The new SDK isn't just sending __END_OF_PART__${uuid} so this needed to become a little smarter.
See related SDK code https://github.com/googleapis/google-http-java-client/blob/master/google-http-client/src/main/java/com/google/api/client/http/MultipartContent.java#L35
